ActorTalk: Hello, Orbital Corridor reception desk. How may I help you?
I'd like to know more about the services your reception desk provides.

The reception desk can assist you with directions, shop complaints, lost and found, security contacts, and more. For any issues you encounter within the Orbital Corridor, please feel free to come to us for help.
Thank you. I'll come by if I need anything.
Of course. We're here whenever you need us.
